mdRecord.dcterms:title: Albert T. Slusher Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Located opposite 1971 Parkway Lane South. Rt. 8, access: South on Rt. 8 from Floyd stoplight, go 4.1 miles, cemetery on the right just before Fairview Church Road. Fenced with wire. 2 evergreen trees. gate on side near road. Park by side of road Rt 8. on gravel.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
